subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Ottawa Senators signed center Chris Kelly to a four-year, $8.5 million deal. Kelly was eligible to become an unrestricted free agent when his current one-year contract with Ottawa, worth $1.263 million, expired July 1. Kelly has 36 goals and 62 assists in 243 regular-season games.
